text: watbena 'anbia' bani 'iisrayiyl eisaa abn maryam mwmnana bima fi altwrat, eamla bma fiha mimaa lam ynskhh ktabh, wa'anzalna 'iilayh al'iinjil hadiana 'iilaa alhq, wmbyinana lamaa jhlh alnaas min hakam allh, wshahdana ealaa sidq altawrat bima ashtml ealayh min ahkamha, waqad jaealnah byanana liladhin yakhafun allah wzajrana lahum ean airtikab almhrramat
